name: Jetway, Inc.
description: Provider of an enterprise travel booking platform designed to make booking and managing business travel simple. The company's enterprise travel booking platform offers to manage and streamline travel reservations, enabling users to avail bulk booking discounts and save time and money spent on travel bookings.
one_liner: Provider of an enterprise travel booking platform designed to make booking and managing business travel simple. The company's enterprise travel booking platform offers to manage and streamline travel reservations, enabling users to avail bulk booking discounts and save time and money spent on travel bookings.
